Menasor heard Astroblasts words but barely. He looked around confused.
"Maximal, which maximal" he saw Firearm still moving and fired on him,
(Menasor is still in flight). Then he realized it probably wasnt Firearm he
was talking about. "That Maximal?" Menasor replied landing beside Condor,
towering over the small robot. "Get this Maximal?" he boomed, and reached
to pick Condor up in his massive hand.

OOC: Going to bed as well, see ya tomorow. BOooya
